comment: They forgot to put in my chip when I got my second Pfizer dose. I'm SO disappointed. My dogs and cat are microchipped. I wanted to have one, too!
amr:
# ::snt They forgot to put in my chip when I got my second Pfizer dose. I'm SO disappointed. My dogs and cat are microchipped. I wanted to have one, too!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / forget-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (p / put-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (c / chip
                        :poss (ii / i))
                  :time (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (d / dose-01
                              :ARG0 (c2 / company
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Pfizer"))
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 2)))))
      :snt2 (d2 / disappoint-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / microchip-00
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (d3 / dog
                              :poss (ii2 / i))
                        :op2 (c3 / cat
                              :poss ii2)))
            :degree (s / so))
      :snt3 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 c
                  :mod (t2 / too))))

comment: Congrats and thank you. G is no big deal. Just get plenty of rest and stay hydrated.
